source_name: Purse seining in India - a review
source_documentation: Technical Data on 4-5 representative purse seine rigs from 1970-2010

gear_models.name: Vessel length to seine weight
gear_models.documentation:
Table 1
LOA	engine hp	Seine length	seine depth	mesh size
14-18m	110-240	700-1500m	70-100m	24-46
15-22	140-350	450-1500	60-100	18-46
11-21	120-350	800-1200	80-100	24-46
18-24	120-510	600-1200	70-100	36-45

Seine weight - Table 2
year	1974	1974	1980	2010
length	292m	366m	350m	1000m
depth	27m	46m	39m	72m
head rope	PES 11mm	PES 22mm	 PES 10mm	 PP 12mm
foot rope	309m PES 12mm	383m PES 25mm	 370m PES 10mm	1188m PP 12mm
Total Weight	 1400kg	3050 kg	 3050kg	 3500 kg
est. metal weight	249kg	226kg	200kg	1110kg

Assume rope has a weight of 0.065 kg/m at 10mm and 0.5 kg/m at 25mm
